title: Riot's punishment system [repost]
body: I recently made a post (a couple days ago?) complaining about what I feel is an unjustified suspension. Basically what happened is that I was talking to a Rioter and they told me I was toxic, and when I asked them what I said they gave me this: "I'm STILL not getting any help". That is why I got suspended? And in the comments, someone asked for the chat logs because they didn't believe me. So I'll leave the pastebin here of my chat logs. If anyone wants additional context or my side of the story, feel free to ask. I will say that the ezreal (in game 2, which was played before game 1) was the same as the zed (adc), who decided to troll because he lost to me in game 2. The entire team was telling him not to troll, but all he did was blame our support after literally inting. That's about as toxic as I got, I believe. Anyways, here's the pastebin: https://pastebin.com/8vX0ctrQ

replies.body: You tilted from champ select and spent all game flaming. More deserved than most and not ambiguous at all.
How exactly was I flaming? And from champ select, how was I tilted? I asked him why he was playing zed bot, and he said "Anything can go adc" so I said whatever
Do you know what "flaming" even means?
That's exactly why I'm asking you. I need to know what EXACTLY constitutes as flame, so that I don't end up saying that next time.

Flaming counts as flaming.

You dont get a free pass to be a total asshole as long as you avoid certain words.

The answer is to not flame, not try to beat the system - which does not work, incidentally.
FF begging at the end of the game, when they were literally at our nexus? Report begging? Where? I said "reported"? How is that report begging AT ALL? Griefing? How? Where?
How long ago was your two week ban?

Because that chat log by itself wouldn’t have been enough to even met you a chat restriction (though it’s possible). But after a two week ban any amount of negativity can and usually dies result in a perma ban.
That was the chat log that gave me the 2 week suspension. I didn't get perma'd yet
